segments.text: I find myself oddly mesmerized by the dynamic in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues to focus on her plates as if the world outside doesn’t matter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for another cookie, his ambition is almost contagious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a rush of anger at how careless he is being on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water pooling at the base of the sink feels like an omen, a warning sign ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl’s anticipation, her palm open as if she’s ready to catch what he gives her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen, usually a place of comfort, feels so fraught with risk right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
